name: Music Player
description: An Advanced Superfast Vc Music Player for Telegram Group ...

ASSISTANT_USERNAME.description: Fill with your assistant username without @

OWNER_USERNAME.description: Fill With your (Bot Owner) username without @

BOT_USERNAME.description: Fill with your bot username without @

BG_IMAGE.description: For background image if you playing

BOT_IMAGE.description: For Private When Giving /start Command to Bot

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Duration limit for your musicplayer (in minutes).

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Fill with your channel username without @, if you haven't one you can leave it default

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Fill with your group username without @, if your haven't one you can leave it default

SUDO_USERS.description: Fill with ID who you made a admin for bot (separate with space).
